channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple File Downloader
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple File Downloader

item.title: CVE-2022-4764|2024-08-03T01:48:40.421Z -- unknown -- simple%20file%20downloader
item.description: The Simple File Downloader WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
